structures.name: Towers
structures.description: Destroying towers does not give CS
structures.notes: Safe to participate in tower destruction

structures.name: Inhibitors
structures.description: Destroying inhibitors does not give CS
structures.notes: Safe to participate in inhibitor destruction

structures.name: Nexus
structures.description: Destroying the nexus does not give CS
structures.notes: Safe to participate in nexus destruction

vision.name: Control Wards
vision.description: Destroying control wards does give CS
vision.notes: Avoid destroying control wards. You can still hit them for damage. Avoid if you have Umbral Glaive.

vision.name: Normal Wards
vision.notes: Avoid destroying wards. You can still hit them for damage. Avoid if you have Umbral Glaive.

vision.name: Farsight Wards
vision.description: Destroying farsight wards does give CS
vision.notes: You can still walk next to them, but do not destroy.

minions.notes: Avoid killing minions of any type

minions.notes: Avoid killing minions of any type

minions.name: Siege Minions
minions.notes: Avoid killing minions of any type

minions.name: Super Minions
minions.notes: Avoid killing minions of any type

general: Focus on champion kills and assists instead of farming
Participate in objective fights without getting the last hit
Your team might question it or tilt, hold it together
Focus on roaming and somewhat keeping your lane healthy
First hit minions, not last hitting them
objectives: Help damage objectives but let teammates get the last hit
Focus on zoning enemies away from objectives
Use crowd control abilities to protect objective takers
Provide vision around objectives without participating in kills
vision: Do not destroy wards, you can still hit them for damage
Place your own wards for map control
Use control wards to deny enemy vision
Ping wards for yout team to take
